TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit VBMath extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi sealed VBMath extends System.Object

summary.span: 模块包含用于执行算术操作的过程。

span.span: The module contains procedures used to perform mathematical operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模块支持用于生成随机数的 Visual Basic 语言关键字和运行库成员。This module supports the Visual Basic language keywords and run-time library members for generating random numbers. ## Examples 此示例使用 `Rnd` 函数生成从1到6范围内的随机整数值。This example uses the `Rnd` function to generate a random integer value in the range from 1 to 6. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#21)]

related.span: Visual Basic 运行时库成员

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Randomize() cil managed
.method public static void Randomize() cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Randomize` 方法的此重载不采用种子值。This overload of the `Randomize` method does not take a seed value. 相反，系统计时器返回的值将用作新的种子值。Instead, the value returned by the system timer is used as the new seed value. 如果未使用 `Randomize`，则 `Rnd` 函数（不带参数）在第一次调用时使用与种子相同的数字，然后使用最后生成的数字作为种子值。If `Randomize` is not used, the `Rnd` function (with no arguments) uses the same number as a seed the first time it is called, and thereafter uses the last-generated number as a seed value. > [!NOTE] > 若要重复随机数值序列，请在将 `Randomize` 与数值参数一起使用之前立即使用负参数调用 `Rnd`。To repeat sequences of random numbers, call `Rnd` with a negative argument immediately before using `Randomize` with a numeric argument. > [!IMPORTANT] > 由于 `Random` 语句和 `Rnd` 函数以种子值开始，并生成介于有限范围内的数字，因此知道用于生成它们的算法的人员可能会预测结果。Because the `Random` statement and the `Rnd` function start with a seed value and generate numbers that fall within a finite range, the results may be predictable by someone who knows the algorithm used to generate them. 因此，不应使用 `Random` 语句和 `Rnd` 函数来生成用于加密的随机数字。Consequently, the `Random` statement and the `Rnd` function should not be used to generate random numbers for use in cryptography. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例使用 `Randomize` 语句来初始化随机数生成器。This example uses the `Randomize` statement to initialize the random-number generator. 由于省略了 number 参数，因此 `Randomize` 使用 `Timer` 函数的返回值作为新的种子值。Because the number argument has been omitted, `Randomize` uses the return value from the `Timer` function as the new seed value. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#21)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Randomize(float64 Number) cil managed
.method public static void Randomize(float64 Number) cil managed

param.name: Number
param.span: 一个 或任何有效的数值表达式。

span.span: An or any valid numeric expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Randomize` 使用 `Number` 初始化 `Rnd` 函数的随机数生成器，并为其提供新的种子值。`Randomize` uses `Number` to initialize the `Rnd` function's random-number generator, giving it a new seed value. 如果省略 `Number`，系统计时器返回的值将用作新的种子值。If you omit `Number`, the value returned by the system timer is used as the new seed value. 如果未使用 `Randomize`，则 `Rnd` 函数（不带参数）在第一次调用时使用与种子相同的数字，然后使用最后生成的数字作为种子值。If `Randomize` is not used, the `Rnd` function (with no arguments) uses the same number as a seed the first time it is called, and thereafter uses the last-generated number as a seed value. > [!NOTE] > 若要重复随机数值序列，请在将 `Randomize` 与数值参数一起使用之前立即使用负参数调用 `Rnd`。To repeat sequences of random numbers, call `Rnd` with a negative argument immediately before using `Randomize` with a numeric argument. 对 `Number` 使用具有相同值的 `Randomize` 不会重复前面的序列。Using `Randomize` with the same value for `Number` does not repeat the previous sequence. > [!IMPORTANT] > 由于 `Random` 语句和 `Rnd` 函数以种子值开始，并生成介于有限范围内的数字，因此知道用于生成它们的算法的人员可能会预测结果。Because the `Random` statement and the `Rnd` function start with a seed value and generate numbers that fall within a finite range, the results may be predictable by someone who knows the algorithm used to generate them. 因此，不应使用 `Random` 语句和 `Rnd` 函数来生成用于加密的随机数字。Consequently, the `Random` statement and the `Rnd` function should not be used to generate random numbers for use in cryptography. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例使用 `Randomize` 语句来初始化随机数生成器。This example uses the `Randomize` statement to initialize the random-number generator. 由于省略了 number 参数，因此 `Randomize` 使用 `Timer` 函数的返回值作为新的种子值。Because the number argument has been omitted, `Randomize` uses the return value from the `Timer` function as the new seed value. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#21)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 返回一个 类型的随机数。

span.span: Returns a random number of type .

returns.span: 序列中的下一个随机数。

span.span: The next random number in the sequence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Rnd` 函数返回小于1但大于或等于零的值。The `Rnd` function returns a value less than 1, but greater than or equal to zero. 在调用 `Rnd`之前，请使用不带参数的 `Randomize` 语句，使用基于系统计时器的种子初始化随机数生成器。Before calling `Rnd`, use the `Randomize` statement without an argument to initialize the random-number generator with a seed based on the system timer. 若要在给定范围内生成随机整数，请使用下面的公式。To produce random integers in a given range, use the following formula. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#30)] 此处，`upperbound` 是范围中的最大数，`lowerbound` 是该范围中的最小数字。Here, `upperbound` is the highest number in the range, and `lowerbound` is the lowest number in the range. > [!NOTE] > 若要重复随机数值序列，请在将 `Randomize` 与数值参数一起使用之前立即使用负参数调用 `Rnd`。To repeat sequences of random numbers, call `Rnd` with a negative argument immediately before using `Randomize` with a numeric argument. > [!IMPORTANT] > 由于 `Random` 语句和 `Rnd` 函数以种子值开始，并生成介于有限范围内的数字，因此知道用于生成它们的算法的人员可能会预测结果。Because the `Random` statement and the `Rnd` function start with a seed value and generate numbers that fall within a finite range, the results may be predictable by someone who knows the algorithm used to generate them. 因此，不应使用 `Random` 语句和 `Rnd` 函数来生成用于加密的随机数字。Consequently, the `Random` statement and the `Rnd` function should not be used to generate random numbers for use in cryptography. ## Examples 此示例使用 `Rnd` 函数生成从1到6范围内的随机整数值。This example uses the `Rnd` function to generate a random integer value in the range from 1 to 6. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#21)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig float32 Rnd(float32 Number) cil managed
Public Function Rnd (Number As Single) As Single
.method public static float32 Rnd(float32 Number) cil managed

param.name: Number
param.span: 一个 值或任何有效的 表达式。

span.span: A value or any valid expression.

summary.span: 返回一个 类型的随机数。

span.span: Returns a random number of type .

returns.span: 如果 Number 小于零，则 Rnd 每次都使用 作为种子生成相同的数字。

span.span: If number is less than zero, Rnd generates the same number every time, using as the seed.

returns.span: 如果 Number 大于零，则 Rnd 生成序列中的下一个随机数。

span.span: If number is greater than zero, Rnd generates the next random number in the sequence.

returns.span: 如果 Number 等于零，则 Rnd 生成最近生成的数字。

span.span: If number is equal to zero, Rnd generates the most recently generated number.

returns.span: 如果未提供 Number，则 Rnd 生成序列中的下一个随机数。

span.span: If number is not supplied, Rnd generates the next random number in the sequence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Rnd` 函数返回小于1但大于或等于零的值。The `Rnd` function returns a value less than 1, but greater than or equal to zero. `Number` 的值确定 `Rnd` 生成随机数的方式。The value of `Number` determines how `Rnd` generates a random number. 对于任何给定的初始种子，都将生成相同的编号序列，因为对 `Rnd` 函数的每个连续调用都使用之前生成的数字作为序列中下一个数字的种子。For any given initial seed, the same number sequence is generated because each successive call to the `Rnd` function uses the previously generated number as a seed for the next number in the sequence. 在调用 `Rnd`之前，请使用不带参数的 `Randomize` 语句，使用基于系统计时器的种子初始化随机数生成器。Before calling `Rnd`, use the `Randomize` statement without an argument to initialize the random-number generator with a seed based on the system timer. 若要在给定范围内生成随机整数，请使用下面的公式。To produce random integers in a given range, use the following formula. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#30)] 此处，`upperbound` 是范围中的最大数，`lowerbound` 是该范围中的最小数字。Here, `upperbound` is the highest number in the range, and `lowerbound` is the lowest number in the range. > [!NOTE] > 若要重复随机数值序列，请在将 `Randomize` 与数值参数一起使用之前立即使用负参数调用 `Rnd`。To repeat sequences of random numbers, call `Rnd` with a negative argument immediately before using `Randomize` with a numeric argument. 对 `Number` 使用具有相同值的 `Randomize` 不会重复前面的序列。Using `Randomize` with the same value for `Number` does not repeat the previous sequence. > [!IMPORTANT] > 由于 `Random` 语句和 `Rnd` 函数以种子值开始，并生成介于有限范围内的数字，因此知道用于生成它们的算法的人员可能会预测结果。Because the `Random` statement and the `Rnd` function start with a seed value and generate numbers that fall within a finite range, the results may be predictable by someone who knows the algorithm used to generate them. 因此，不应使用 `Random` 语句和 `Rnd` 函数来生成用于加密的随机数字。Consequently, the `Random` statement and the `Rnd` function should not be used to generate random numbers for use in cryptography. ## Examples 此示例使用 `Rnd` 函数生成从1到6范围内的随机整数值。This example uses the `Rnd` function to generate a random integer value in the range from 1 to 6. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#21)]
